title: Cultural Awareness
description: Enhance your Japanese speaking skills with phrases focused on cultural awareness. Emphasize clear pronunciation and respectful intonation.
instructions: Below is a list of phrases that promote cultural awareness and appreciation in Japanese.
Aim for clear, respectful, and thoughtful pronunciation.
Maintain a conversational and considerate pace.

items.question: 文化的多様性を理解することが重要です。 (Bunkateki tayousei o rikai suru koto ga juuyou desu.)
items.answer: 文化的多様性を理解することが重要です。 (Bunkateki tayousei o rikai suru koto ga juuyou desu.)

items.question: 異なる文化の豊かさを評価しましょう。 (Kotonaru bunka no yutakasa o hyouka shimashou.)
items.answer: 異なる文化の豊かさを評価しましょう。 (Kotonaru bunka no yutakasa o hyouka shimashou.)
